entry.value: ### This node updates the economic structure of a country%%00010### Method: Multiply each indicators of transition with the associated economic flows%%00010%%00010## Define sectors as row index%%00010eco = input_table_2.copy() # EU reference economic structure%%00010eco = eco.set_index('Sector')%%00010eco.index.names = [None]%%00010%%00010## Modify household consumption%%00010# Food%%00010eco.at['Beverage', 'Households'] = input_table_1['indicator_household_beverages[%]']*eco.at['Beverage', 'Households']%%00010eco.at['Crops, Vegetables and Fruits', 'Households'] = input_table_1['indicator_household_veg-fruits-crops[%]']*eco.at['Crops, Vegetables and Fruits', 'Households']%%00010eco.at['Livestock', 'Households'] = 'Households']%%00010eco.at['Processed crops and vegetables', 'Households'] = input_table_1['indicator_household_processed-veg[%]']*eco.at['Processed crops and vegetables', 'Households']%%00010eco.at['Processed Animal', 'Households'] = input_table_1['indicator_household_animals[%]']*eco.at['Processed Animal', 'Households']%%00010#Energy%%00010eco.at['Wood', 'Households'] (input_table_1['elc_opex_RES_other_hydroelectric[MEUR]']/input_table_1['elc_opex[MEUR]'])*elec_tech%%00010eco.at['Wind power', 'Electricity Supply'] = (input_table_1['elc_opex_RES_wind[MEUR]']/input_table_1['elc_opex[MEUR]'])*elec_tech%%00010eco.at['Oil Power', 'Electricity Supply'] = (input_table_1['elc_opex_fossil_gas[MEUR]']/input_table_1['elc_opex[MEUR]'])*elec_tech*(1-elec_gas_share)%%00010eco.at['Biomass Power', 'Electricity Supply'] = (input_table_1['elc_opex_RES_solar_pv[MEUR]']/input_table_1['elc_opex[MEUR]'])*elec_tech%%00010eco.at['ST Power', 'Electricity Supply'] = (input_table_1['elc_opex_RES_solar_csp[MEUR]']/input_table_1['elc_opex[MEUR]'])*elec_tech%%00010eco.at['Marine Power', 'Electricity Supply'] = (input_table_1['elc_opex_RES_other_marine[MEUR]']/input_table_1['elc_opex[MEUR]'])*elec_tech%%00010eco.at['Geothermal Power', 'Electricity Supply'] = Fruits':'Other services', 'Crops, Vegetables and Fruits':'Other services'].values*tech_ref_tot/tech_sum %%00010eco = eco.fillna(0)%%00010%%00010## Generate output%%00010output_table =
